script.visual_description: Wide shot of Mia Chen, 28, in hoodie and ponytail, typing furiously on her laptop amid buzzing desks and city views. Screen shows error pop-ups and buggy code. Camera zooms in on her frustrated expression as coffee spills nearby.
script.audio_cue: Tense, pulsing electronic music builds urgency with keyboard clacks and error beeps.

script.visual_description: Close-up on laptop screen: unreliable AI outputs flash—red warnings of potential harms like data leaks. Mia rubs her temples, scrolls through generic AI interfaces. Cut to over-shoulder shot as she deletes code in exasperation.
script.audio_cue: Rising tension in music, with discordant synth tones and frustrated sigh SFX.

script.visual_description: Medium shot: Dr. Elias Grant, 52, in button-down with Anthropic pin, approaches Mia with tablet. He points to screen showing Claude API integration. Quick cuts: Mia's eyes widen in curiosity; they gesture excitedly over holographic code previews.
script.audio_cue: Music shifts to hopeful melody, subtle whoosh for interface transitions.

script.visual_description: Dynamic montage: Fingers typing rapidly; clean, green-checkmarked code appears on screen with explanatory annotations. Camera circles as Mia smiles, testing app simulation—virtual users interact safely without errors.
script.audio_cue: Uplifting strings swell, with positive confirmation chimes.

script.visual_description: Triumphant wide shot: Mia high-fives Elias; app launches successfully on her phone, showing ethical safeguards. Team cheers faintly in background. Pan to window overlooking San Francisco bay, symbolizing clarity.
script.audio_cue: Music peaks with inspiring crescendo, applause SFX fades in.

script.visual_description: Fade to logo reveal: Anthropic symbol emerges from flowing code lines. Slow zoom out to include links: anthropic.com, Claude API. End with serene bay view.
